scripts.sanity:extract: cd apps/sanity && bunx sanity schema extract
scripts.sanity:gen: bun run sanity:extract && cd apps/sanity && sanity typegen generate
scripts.apps:dev: concurrently "cd apps/astro && bun run dev" "cd apps/sanity && bun run dev"

scriptsComments.dev: Starts the apps in development mode
scriptsComments.astro:build: Builds the Astro app for production
scriptsComments.sanity:extract: Extracts the schema from the Sanity Studio
scriptsComments.sanity:gen: Generates the TypeScript types for the schema
scriptsComments.apps:dev: Starts the apps in development mode
